body: Zn powder of 10mg is made into pellet \(quantity could vary depending on the needs).
A Si cap is placed over Zn pellet
Si cap with Zn pellet is placed at the centre of the quartz boat.
The whole assembly with the quartz boat is placed inside the alumina work tube in a horizontal tube furnace ensuring the assembly with quartz boat is at the centre of the furnace.
Substrates for growth of nanowires are placed very close to the source typically 5 mm from the centre on quartz boat.
Growth temperature could vary from 550 ~ 900 Â°C with desired growth time period as per requirement.
More than one source with cap could be used for enhancing the growth of nanowire.
If suitable platform could be provided and substrate height could be matched with that of the top of source pellet, growth on ultra large area substrate can be realized.
